Text: Project Tangerine Cc The attachment below is a draft of the Board presentation for Project Tangerine David and I wanted to get it to you to give you a chance to review it We would very much appreciate any suggestions you could make to improve its effectiveness Thanks for your help George

Project Tangerine Cc The attachment below is a draft of the Board presentation for Project Tangerine David and I wanted to get it to you to give you a chance to review it We would very much appreciate any suggestions you could make to improve its effectiveness Thanks for your help George

Re Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidentialfor the help Dan I didnt know if Jeff was in today or not I will forward Jeffs version to you for reference purposes I think the best course of action is to mark up their form with the changes we would need and add whatever you think is necessary Then well just email it back to them for comments It seems to me they are trying to drag their feet so if we can push them a little that would be great Enron North America Corp From Dan J Hyvl AM To George CT cc Subject Re Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidential George I am not sure what language Jeff had proposed however I would note that years from disclosure is too long I would suggest that the period be shortened years from the date of the agreement or years from disclosure The choice of law as New Jersey is also a problem I would prefer Texas or New York Also the correct name for ENA is Enron North America Corp Please let me know how you want to respond to their draft of the document Enron North America Corp From George McCormick AM To Dan J CT cc Subject Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidential Dan Can you compare this CA sent to us by PSEG to the standard one Jeff had sent them Thanks George Forwarded by George McCormickHOUECT on AM From Jeffrey T Hodge PM To Dan J CT cc George CT Subject Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidential Dan you may have to help George with this while I am away Thanks Jeff Forwarded by Jeffrey T HodgeHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From George McCormick PM To Jeffrey T CT cc Subject Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidential Jeff I just received this I thought you would like to look it over with me Thanks George Forwarded by George McCormickHOUECT on PM Carretta Kenneth R on PM To George CT cc Wohlfarth David W Subject Confidentiality AgreementPrivileged and Confidential Mr McCormick As the request of Dave Wohlfarth I am forwarding to you a proposed form of confidentiality agreement to govern the exchange of confidential information in connection with a proposed transaction between PSEG and Enron Kenneth R Carretta Assistant General Solicitor condientiality ENAdoc condientiality ENAdoc
